metadata.title: CVE-2024-36973 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: misc:microchip: pci1xxxx: fix double free in the error handling ofgp_aux_bus_probe() When auxiliary_device_add() returns error and then callsauxiliary_device_uninit(), callback function gp_auxiliary_device_release()calls ida_free() and kfree(aux_device_wrapper) to free memory. We should'tcall them again in the error handling path. Fix this by skipping theredundant cleanup functions.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
